title: Kuradashi: E-Commerce Website that Combines Food Loss with Social Good | TOKYO UPDATES [The Official ... - TOKYO UPDATES（トーキョー・アップデーツ）
summary: The article discusses Kuradashi, an e-commerce platform focused on reducing food loss by selling products that are still consumable but not typically sold through conventional channels. Founded by Sekito Tatsuya, Kuradashi operates with a mission to promote social good, allowing consumers to purchase products nearing their best-by dates at discounted prices while donating a portion of sales to social organizations. With a growing member base and partnerships with numerous companies, Kuradashi aims to transform Tokyo into a leader in sustainability and social entrepreneurship.
green_innovation: TRUE - This is a green innovation as it reduces food waste and promotes sustainability through a business model that addresses food loss, benefiting both the environment and society.
business_innovation: TRUE - This represents a business innovation because it introduces a new e-commerce model that significantly differs from traditional food distribution practices by focusing on unsold consumable goods.
green_product: TRUE - The products sold by Kuradashi are designed to minimize waste and environmental impact by making use of food that would otherwise be discarded.
green_process: TRUE - The process employed by Kuradashi involves a unique method of sourcing and selling food products that reduces waste and promotes sustainability, reflecting an environmentally friendly operational practice.
